/* BoardMapper.ListBoard */
SELECT B.BOARD_ID, B.BOARD_NAME, B.BOARD_CONTENT, B.BOARD_TYPE_CODE, CD.CODE_NAME AS BOARD_TYPE_CODE_NAME, B.USE_YN FROM CO_BOARD B LEFT JOIN CO_CODE CD ON CD.CODE_VALUE = B.BOARD_TYPE_CODE AND CD.UP_CODE_ID = 'BOARD_TYPE_00' WHERE B.DELETE_YN = 'N' ORDER BY B.BOARD_NAME

/* BoardMapper.GetBoard */
SELECT B.BOARD_ID, B.BOARD_NAME, B.BOARD_CONTENT, B.BOARD_TYPE_CODE, B.USE_YN FROM CO_BOARD B WHERE B.BOARD_ID = @BoardId

/* BoardMapper.UpdateBoard */
UPDATE CO_BOARD SET BOARD_NAME = @BoardName, BOARD_CONTENT = @BoardContent, BOARD_TYPE_CODE = @BoardTypeCode, USE_YN = @UseYn, UPDATER_ID = @UpdaterId, UPDATE_DT = SYSDATE() WHERE BOARD_ID = @BoardId

/* BoardMapper.RemoveBoard */
UPDATE CO_BOARD SET DELETE_YN = 'Y', UPDATER_ID = @UpdaterId, UPDATE_DT = SYSDATE() WHERE BOARD_ID = @BoardId
